snippet: The island nation seeks to rebuild its economy after the collapse of its banking industry, but its natural gas industry so far exists mainly in theory.
abstract: Cyprus, seeking to rebuild its economy after collapse of its banking industry, will announce agreement with French oil company Total to develop plant to liquefy natural gas; questions remain, given that Cyprus's own offshore natural gas reserves have yet to be developed.
lead_paragraph: The island nation seeks to rebuild its economy after the collapse of its banking industry, but its natural gas industry so far exists mainly in theory.

headline.main: Cyprus in Plan to Develop a Natural Gas Industry
headline.print_headline: Cyprus in Plan to Develop A Natural Gas Industry
